_comment: !!! THIS IS AN AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED FILE - DO NOT EDIT !!!
name: divi/woocommerce-cart-products
title: Woo Cart Products

videos.name: Design Settings and Advanced Module Settings
Saving and loading from the library

item.label: Show Product Image
item.description: Here you can choose whether or not to display the Product image.

item.label: Show Coupon Code
item.description: Here you can choose whether or not to display the Coupon code.

item.label: Show Update Cart Button
item.description: Here you can choose whether or not to display the Update cart button.

item.label: Show Remove Item Icon
item.description: Here you can choose whether or not to display the Remove Item Icon.

tableHeader.selector: {{selector}} table.cart th, {{selector}}.et_pb_row_layout_vertical table.shop_table_responsive tr td::before, {{selector}}.et_pb_row_layout_default table.shop_table_responsive tr td::before

item.label: Table Header Background Color
item.description: Pick a color to fill the module's table header.

bodyFont.selector: {{selector}} tbody td, {{selector}} ul.products li.product .woocommerce-loop-product__title, {{selector}} ul.products li.product .price

value.color: {{selector}} tbody td a, {{selector}} tbody td:not(.actions), {{selector}} ul.products h1, {{selector}} ul.products h2, {{selector}} ul.products h3, {{selector}} ul.products h4, {{selector}} ul.products h5, {{selector}} ul.products h6, {{selector}} ul.products li.product .price
value.font-family: {{selector}} tbody td, {{selector}} ul.products li.product .woocommerce-loop-product__title, {{selector}} ul.products li.product .price
value.font-size: {{selector}} tbody td, {{selector}} ul.products li.product .woocommerce-loop-product__title, {{selector}} ul.products li.product .price

item.label: Table Background Color
item.description: Pick a color to fill the module's table.

item.label: Table Row Background Color
item.description: Pick a color to fill the module's table row.

item.label: Table Cell Background Color
item.description: Pick a color to fill the module's table cell.

item.label: Table Cell Alternating Background Color
item.description: Pick a color to fill the module's table alternating cell.

item.label: Remove Icon Background Color
item.description: Pick a color to fill the module's remove icon.

removeIconColor.label: Remove Icon Color
removeIconColor.description: Pick a color to be used for the remove icon.

removeIconSize.label: Remove Icon Font Size
removeIconSize.description: Control the size of the icon by increasing or decreasing the font size.

maxWidth.label: Image Width
maxWidth.description: Adjust the width of the image within the table.

item.label: Use Focus Borders
item.description: Enabling this option will add borders to input fields when focused.

item.label: Field Background Color
item.description: Pick a color to fill the module's input fields.

desktop.value: {{selector}} .quantity input.qty, {{selector}} .quantity input.qty::placeholder, {{selector}} .quantity input.qty::-webkit-input-placeholder, {{selector}} .quantity input.qty::-moz-placeholder, {{selector}} .quantity input.qty:-ms-input-placeholder, {{selector}} table.cart td.actions .coupon .input-text, {{selector}} table.cart td.actions .coupon .input-text::placeholder, {{selector}} table.cart td.actions .coupon .input-text::-webkit-input-placeholder, {{selector}} table.cart td.actions .coupon .input-text::-moz-placeholder, {{selector}} table.cart td.actions .coupon .input-text:-ms-input-placeholder
desktop.hover: {{selector}} .quantity input.qty{{:hover}}, {{selector}} .quantity input.qty{{:hover}}::placeholder, {{selector}} .quantity input.qty{{:hover}}::-webkit-input-placeholder, {{selector}} .quantity input.qty{{:hover}}::-moz-placeholder, {{selector}} .quantity input.qty{{:hover}}:-ms-input-placeholder, {{selector}} table.cart td.actions .coupon .input-text{{:hover}}, {{selector}} table.cart td.actions .coupon .input-text{{:hover}}::placeholder, {{selector}} table.cart td.actions .coupon .input-text{{:hover}}::-webkit-input-placeholder, {{selector}} table.cart td.actions .coupon .input-text{{:hover}}::-moz-placeholder, {{selector}} table.cart td.actions .coupon .input-text{{:hover}}:-ms-input-placeholder
